name: Donimo
description:
You awaken in a dark cave. A glowing crown speaks to you and grants you an unimageable power.  Let your enemies give you power as you battle through this surreal/fantasy landscape. 

This demo was made for the Metroidvania Month 14 Jam.

Credits:

Art: Tomás Zamorano

Level Design/Additional Art: Orange Whale

Player voice/ Additional Story: Katelyn Mathis

Programming: Tyler Goetz

Additional programming: Omar

Music: Eric Lagergren

Sound Effects/Story Board- Arin Eakins

UI art & Backgrounds: Dan Reus
